trans-unit.source: Instructions for successful sign in experience for subscribers who have not associated their Work or School Account with their Microsoft Account.
trans-unit.target: Instructions for successful sign in experience for subscribers who have not associated their Work or School Account with their Microsoft Account.

trans-unit.source: Steps for Successful Sign In: Using "Work or School" Account
trans-unit.target: Steps for Successful Sign In: Using "Work or School" Account

trans-unit.source: Are you a company-based subscriber and you have NOT associated your Work or School account with your “personal” Microsoft Account (MSA)?
trans-unit.target: Are you a company-based subscriber and you have NOT associated your Work or School account with your “personal” Microsoft Account (MSA)?

trans-unit.source: Then you need to use your Work or School account to log in and consume your subscription benefits available at https://my.visualstudio.com.
trans-unit.target: Then you need to use your Work or School account to log in and consume your subscription benefits available at https://my.visualstudio.com.

trans-unit.source: Refer to the Sign In Using "Work or School" Account article for additional details on successful sign in and benefit validation.
trans-unit.target: Refer to the Sign In Using "Work or School" Account article for additional details on successful sign in and benefit validation.
